mermaidDiagramGuidelines.description: Guidelines for creating Mermaid diagrams in this workspace
rules: ❌ Never use numbered list format in node labels (e.g., '1. Extract Data')
✅ Use descriptive labels without numbers (e.g., 'Extract Data')
❌ Avoid parentheses in node labels that might conflict with syntax
✅ Use alternative separators like dashes or line breaks
🔍 Always validate diagrams using mermaid-diagram-validator before committing
📚 See MERMAID_GUIDELINES.md for detailed best practices

commonIssues.numberedLists: Mermaid interprets '1. ', '2. ' as markdown list syntax
commonIssues.parentheses: Can conflict with node shape definitions
commonIssues.specialCharacters: Characters like (), {}, [] have special meaning in Mermaid
